data.name: MainModuleDirectoryDescription
data.value: The relative path from the current workspace to the root directory of the module.

data.name: SourceManifestPathDescription
data.value: The relative path from the current workspace to the main module manifest file.

data.name: StringLocalizationManifestDescription
data.value: The relative path from the current workspace to the string localization psd1 file.

data.name: MarkdownDocsPathDescription
data.value: The relative path from the current workspace to the directory where markdown files are stored.

data.name: FunctionPathsDescription
data.value: The relative path(s) from the current workspace to the directory(ies) where functions are stored.

data.name: NewLineDescription
data.value: The string used to created line breaks. Defaults to "[Environment]::NewLine"

data.name: TabStringDescription
data.value: The string used to created indents. Defaults to four spaces.

data.name: EnableAutomaticNamespaceRemovalDescription
data.value: Specifies whether namespaces will automatically be removed when writing type literal expressions. Removed namespaces will be automatically added as a using statement.

data.name: CommandSplatRefactor_VariableNameDescription
data.value: The variable name to use when creating the splat expression variable. The default behavior is to name the string similar to "getCommandNameHereSplat". Setting this to $null will enforce the default behavior.

data.name: CommandSplatRefactor_NewLineAfterHashtableDescription
data.value: Specifies whether a new line should be placed between the hashtable and the original command expression.

data.name: CommandSplatRefactor_AdditionalParametersDescription
data.value: Specifies if additional parameters that have not been should be added to the splat expression. The following options are available: "None" - Only bound parameters. This is the default. "Mandatory" - Mandatory parameters that have not yet been bound will be added. "All" - All resolved parameters will be added.

data.name: CommandSplatRefactor_ExcludeHintsDescription
data.value: Specifies whether the value for additional unbound parameters should be a variable of the same name as the parameter, or if it should be decorated with mandatoriness and parameter type. $true - Path = $path $false - Path = $mandatoryStringPath

data.name: ExpandMemberExpression_AllowNonPublicMembers
data.value: Specifies whether non-public members should be included in the list of resolved members. If a non-public member is selected, an expression utilizing reflection will be generated to access the member.

data.name: UsingStatements_SeparateGroupsWithNewLineDescription
data.value: Specifies whether groups of using statement types should be separated with a new line character.

data.name: UsingStatements_SystemNamespaceFirstDescription
data.value: Specifies whether using statements that start with "System" should be ordered first regardless of alphabetical order.

data.name: UsingStatements_UsingKindOrderDescription
data.value: The order in which groups of using statement types will appear.
